scripts.setup: yarn install --non-interactive && yarn --cwd host install --non-interactive && yarn --cwd remote install --non-interactive
scripts.dev:prod: concurrently "HOST=127.0.0.1 PORT=8081 NODE_ENV=production yarn --cwd remote dev" "PORT=8080 REMOTE_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8081 NODE_ENV=production yarn --cwd host dev"
scripts.build: yarn --cwd remote build && yarn --cwd host build
scripts.start:prod: yarn build && concurrently "node scripts/static-server.js remote/dist 8081" "PORT=8080 REMOTE_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8081 NODE_ENV=production yarn --cwd host start"
